concept.title: Notifications for player status, activity, errors, and logging
concept.shortdesc: MediaPlayerNotification objects provide information about changes in player state, warnings, and errors. Errors that stop the playback of the video also cause a change in the state of the player.

conbody.p: Your application can retrieve the notification and state information. You can also create a logging system for diagnostics and validation by using the notification information.
You implement event listeners to capture and respond to events. Many events provide MediaPlayerNotification status notifications.
